string.value: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away.... {0} has started a game! Join to visit the Mos Eisley Cantina.
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away.... WAR! {0} has started a game!
I feel a disturbance in the Force. {0} has started a CHAOS GAME! Do you dare to join?
{0} is using the Force to spread CHAOS! Join to stop them!
1 minute left to Join and visit the cantina
{0} seconds left to Join and visit the cantina
The Empire and Rebels are not present, cancelling game!

It is a dark time for the Rebellion. Although the Death Star has been destroyed, Imperial troops have driven the Rebel forces from their hidden base and pursued them across the galaxy. Updating Roles.
Luke Skywalker has returned to his home planet of Tatooine in an attempt to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of the vile gangster Jabba the Hutt. Updating Roles.

It is a period of civil war. Rebel spaceships, striking from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire.
Updating Roles and Galactic Database.

Mos Eisley Spaceport. You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. We must be cautious.
Updating Roles and Galactic Database.

There is unrest in the Galactic Senate. Several thousand solar systems have declared their intentions to leave the Republic.
Updating Roles and Galactic Database.
Turmoil has engulfed the Galactic Republic. The taxation of trade routes to outlying star systems is in dispute. Hoping to resolve the matter, I will now assign your roles.
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. You may not join the game until you do.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back in the ground... jeez!
{0} has fled from the cantina!
{0} players remain.
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
{0} has voted to shoot {1}.
{0} has voted to eliminate {1} from the cantina.
{0} has not voted 2 times in a row. This disturbance in the force cannot be tolerated. {0} suddenly falls, dead. {1}
The last traces of the Empire have been eliminated!! You rise in power in the absence of the Empire...
Choice accepted.
R2D2 is {0}.
{0} was R2D2. You step up in his absence to access the central computer for information to help the Resistance.
{0} is BB-8, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s duty accessing the central computer.
Bleep-Boop-Beep! {0} is {1} according to the central computer!
Who do you want to eliminate from the cantina?
Who do you want to detect?
Who do you want to shoot? {0} shot(s) remain.
Who do you want to visit?
Who's role would you like to see?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to kill?
Who do you want to hunt?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to the Sith Cult?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are DJ, A Codebreaker 😾. You are currently helping the Resistance, but your loyalty will switch if caught (or bought) by the Empire.
You are Jyn Erso 🕵, a spy for the Rebellion. Each day you will look for information key to the downfall of the Empire. However, the Empire has a 40% chance to detect you accessing their systems.
You are Obi Wan Kenobi 🍻. Mistaken as a crazy hermit, you are the most loyal of allies. Your death will buy time for the Rebels for one night.

AAARARRRGWWWH! You are Chewbacca 👼. Your fearsome presence will scare away the Stormtroopers. Each night, you may choose a player to guard. However, if you choose a stormtrooper, there is a 50% chance you will die.

You are Han Solo 🔫, Smuggler and Pilot of the Millennium Falcon. You have two shots. During the day, you may choose to shoot another player. Everyone will here the shots, and know you are the scruffy nerfherder.

You are Aayla Secura 💋, a Force-sensitive Twi'lek Jedi. Each night you will check another player for signs of the Dark Side. However--if you check the Empire, or check someone killed by the Empire, you will be caught and killed. If Empire tries to kill you while you are checking others, you will survive.
Traitor! You are Ben Solo 🖕, the son of Han and Leia. In the absence of the Empire, you will be seduced by the Dark Side, and rise with a terrifying raw power.
You are a Stormtrooper 🐺, the soldiers of the Empire. Each night you can choose to kill someone.
You are an Astromech droid 👳. Each night you may check the central computer for information about another player.
You are a lowly rebel 👱. You hope to see the oppression of the Empire ended once and for all.

You are the infamous bounty hunter Boba Fett 👺. You are the coolest character in all of the Star Wars Universe. If the cantina votes to eliminate you, they should all be ashamed. You don't fight for the Empire or the rebellion. You are destined to die in the belly of the Sarlacc. Perhaps getting lynched would be a better end for you. If lynched, you win automatically!

You are Asajj Ventress 👶, a nightsister trained in the ways of the Jedi. Pick a player to be your 'role model' - but beware! If your role model dies, you will turn against your jedi ways and fight against the rebels.
You are C-3PO 👁, a droid programmed for etiquette and protocol, and a constant companion to astromech R2-D2. You know who is the real R2-D2.
You are BB-8 🙇, the loveable astromech droid. If R2-D2 dies, you will take their place accessing the central database for information.
You are a Sith Cultist 👤. Every night, you may choose a player to convert to a cultist. If all remaining living players at the end following your Sith Lord, they win.

You are the Jedi Master Qui Gon Jinn 💂, trying to stop the Sith Cult from spreading throughout the universe! Each night, choose a player. If they are a Sith cultist, you kill them. If the Sith Cult tries to convert you, the Cult's newest member dies.

The force is out of balance... Everyone agrees someone needs to eliminated to restore balance to the force! Who shall be eliminated from the cantina this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
The cantina is in uproar after the previous disturbance. Clearly something must be done. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations, defences, or just enjoy a drink.
Everyone in the cantina settles down at their tables for drinks. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
Everyone in the cantina has cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is dragged out of the cantina and eliminated. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who should be kicked out of the cantina, everyone returns to their tables and drinks, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No one will be eliminated...
A blaster shot fires from somewhere, and {0} falls to the ground. Those nearby look over to see the body of {0}, the rebel spy Jyn Erso. The Empire must have caught her accessing their systems.
"RAWRGWAWGGR" {0} yells, dying at the hands of the Empire. The wookie, Chewbacca has been killed!.
As everyone looks up at their drinks, they find the body of the scruffy nerfherder {0}, dead at the hands of the Empire. You have lost Han Solo.
Everyone looks up when there is a long sad "BEEP-BLOOOOoooo..." the droid {0} shuts down, and no longer responds to anyone. R2D2 is deactivated.

{0} shuts down his lightsaber, gives a solemn nod to his allies, and dies. "Noooooooo!" Obi Wan Kenobi's sacrifice will not be for nothing - his loss buys time for the rebels to escape the clutches of the Empire.
Everyone looks up the to see the defective droid {0} sputtering and sparking, then shutting down. R5-D4 aka Red is deactivated.
A commotion breaks out on the other side of the cantina. The music stops and everyone gathers around to find the body of {0}. "These blast points... only Empire Stormtroopers are so precise". {1}
Ksshhhhhhzzzzzt! A Sith cultist's lightsaber falls to the ground, along with the body of cultist who held it. {0} has been slain by Qui Gon Jinn!
The cantina seems oddly peaceful. Everyone seems to be minding their own business.

You have been cornered by Empire stormtroopers. As you were DJ, you have no loyalty to the rebels you would have helped. The real money to be made is from the Empire anyways. You join the Empire, and will attack rebels as a stormtrooper!
Your Empire teammate(s) are: {0}
{0} was DJ, the codebreaker who had been helping the resistance. His loyalty is easily bought, and he joins the empire. He is now a stormtrooper like you.
You sense someone approaching. It's the stormtroopers! They question you, but you give them no useful information about the rebels. They shoot you with their blasters.

Oh no! {0} was Old Ben Kenobi! His robes fall to the floor, but the body is no where to be found. The Empire will waste the next night poking uselessly at the empty robes, instead of attacking another target...
"RRRAARRWHHGWWR." You tried to guard the Empire! They capture and kill you.
"AAARARRRGWWWH." You have saved {0}'s life!
"WWWRRRRRRGWWWRRRR." {0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
"RWGWGWARAHHHHWWRGGWRWRW." You went to guard {0}, but they weren't around!
"WAGRRRRWWGAHHHHWWWRRGGAWWWWWWRR." Chewbacca was watching over you last night and scared away an attacker!
Aayla Secura chose the wrong time to keep to herself. {0} has been killed by the Empire!
PEW PEW PEW! Odd... {0} was standing right there, but none of your stormtroopers could hit their target.
You try to search {0} for traces of the Dark Side of the force, only to be confronted by a stormtrooper. They kill you. You are dead.
Aayla checked the wrong person last night! {0}'s lightsaber rests with her, in a pool of blood on the cantina floor. She has been killed by the Empire she must have been checking.
Aayla Secura tried checking {1}, searching for signs of the Dark Side of the force. Instead, {0} finds the stormtroopers killing {1}! They turn their blasters on {0}. Aayla Secura is dead.
You cannot find signs {0} part of the Empire or is using the Dark Side of the force.
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but you realize that Aayla Secura bumped into you, and has slipped away into the crowd.
You spotted {0} snooping about! That must the rebel spy Jyn Erso!!
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}.
PEW PEW! {0} lowers his blaster, and casually returns to his drink. {1} is dead.
PEW PEW! The sound of blaster fire erupts in the cantina. Everyone turns to see {1}'s body slump over, shot by Han Solo. {0} lowers their blaster and casually returns to their drink. {2}
The Empire has won! These are dark days for galaxy.
The Empire has won! There is no hope for the galaxy.
The Rebels have won!
Oh no! You voted to eliminate Boba Fett! He's like the coolest character ever. Everyone should be ashamed. Boba Fett wins because this is a better death for him than the belly of the Sarlacc.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to spread your Sith Lord's influence using the dark side of the force, and convert {1}... however, they were Jedi Master Qui Gon Jinn! {0} is dead!
{0} came to you, ready to convert you.... but you sliced him in two with your lightsaber. A Sith cultist is dead... {1} remain!
The Sith cult has converted you to their order! You now follow the dark side and a Sith Lord. Every night, you will have a chance to convert another player.
Sith Cultists: {0}
{0} has joined the Sith Cult! The influence of the Dark Side is spreading...
{0} was sent to spread the power of the Dark Side of the force, and convert {1}... however, they were not to be found.
The powder of the Dark Side is unmistakable. Everyone remaining in the Mos Eisley Cantina have joined the Sith Cultists.. The cult has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go visit {0} and find a red lightsaber - the signature weapon of the Sith. You quickly slice the evil Sith Cultist in two, then power down your own lightsaber.
You go visit {0}, but there is no trace of the Dark Side here. You return to your table, convinced that {0} is not a Sith Cultist.
{0}'s role model just died! In rage, Asajj turns to the dark side and fight along side with the Stormtroopers!
{0} has died! In your rage, you turn against the Jedi ways and fight along with the Stormtroopers! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Rebel 👱
Old Ben Kenobi 🍻
Aayla Secura 💋
Ben Solo 🖕
Chewbacca 👼
Jyn Erso 🕵
a Stormtrooper 🐺
the codebreaker, DJ 😾
Han Solo 🔫
Boba Fett 👺
R5-D4 aka Red 🃏
Asajj Ventress 👶
C-3PO 👁
BB-8 🙇
a Sith Cultist 👤
Jedi Master Qui Gon Jinn 💂
Ran away
💀 Dead
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
an Ewok 👷
You are an Ewok 👷. You will be told the identity of any other Ewoks in your tribe.
PEW PEW! They find the body of {0}, matted fur and blood splattered everywhere. An Ewok has been killed!
the Ewok tribe: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0} to convert them, but instead finds the ruthless Stormtroopers...
The Empire heads to {0} to kill them, but they are met by a tall dark furry figure. "AAAAAWWWRRRRRRGWWWRRRR!!!" The Wookie's yell scares everyone away. You head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them to the Dark Side :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.

You visit {0}'s table... but you leave as soon as you sense traces of the dark side. You get up and leave, noticing the strange red glow of their lightsaber. You sneak away before they can catch you...
was
As the cantina looks up from their drinks, they gather around the remains of {0}, who died somehow...
Odd.... your fellow furry Ewok {0} has gone missing from the tribe... O.o
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
You are already in a game! ({0})
There is no game running. There is balance in the force... Surely this cannot last. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
You lack mastery of the Force and cannot run this command. Only a group admin can run this command.
R2-D2 cannot be found!
Time's up!
You are Jabba the Hutt 🏹. You may select two prisoners, binding them together for your entertainment. If one of them dies, the other will be killed as well.

You are a Shapeshifter 🎭, changeling, skin-changer, amorph. You have the ability to shift your form, to pose as another. However, you must wait until they die to assume their form, so not to cause suspicion. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are Baze Malbus 🎯, a former guardian of the Jedi Temple of Kyber. You carry a big gun, and if you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are blasted by the empire, you have a chance to take a Stormtrooper down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.

You are Darth Vader 🔪. The Rebels have stolen the plans for the ultimate weapon, the Death Star. Enraged by this act, you will interrogate and kill anyone who might have information on the whereabouts of the stolen plans. No one is safe from you, not even the Empire or Sith Cults if they get in your way.

At the command of Jabba, you are taken and shackled to another prisoner. {0} is shackled on the other end of the chain - you fates are bound together. If one of you dies, the other one will be killed as well. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
The cantina has chosen to eliminate you! This is your last chance, you may make your final shot and take someone else out as you go down! Your death will not be in vain!
{0} fumbles for their his heavy cannon as the crowds surround them, but cannot get it in time. They are dragged out of the cantina and killed. Baze was unable to kill anyone as he died...
{0} pulls out their heavy cannon and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. Accepting his fate, Baze is killed and does not kill another as he dies...
Surrounded by the crowd, {0} pulls out his heavy repeater cannon, takes aim, and fires! PEW PEW! {1} falls dead as the crowd swarms around Baze! {2}

You find yourself being choked to death by an unseen force! Darth Vader tries to interrogate you, but you say nothing. Instead you reach for you cannon, and pull the trigger as you black out. You have the chance to shoot someone... make it quick!
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their weapon, as they lay in a pool of blood...
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breaths, they can't decide who to shoot... and accept their fate.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground.... but not without grabbing his cannon, and firing upon {1}, who takes a shot right between the eyes. {2}
The stormtroopers tried to attack Baze Malbus last night, but Baze was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} fought for the Empire, but has died.
The stormtroopers tried to attack Baze Malbus last night, but Baze was prepared and mowed down {0} with multiple blasts from his heavy repeater cannon!
The Empire tried to kill Darth Vader last night. {0}'s body is found, slashed in two pieces by Darth Vader's lightsaber!

Gasping for breath, {0}'s feet leave the floor, floating above the ground, held by an invisible force. Suddenly the their body collapse to the floor. No one in the cantina seems to have seen Darth Vader as killed {0}. {1}

You wanted to interrogate {0} for information about the stolen Death Star plans. However, {0} was protected by the Wookie Chewbacca. Chewbacca's roar would draw too much attention right now, so you decide to wait until later. No kill for you tonight...
The Sith cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a blaster fires and {0}'s body falls to the floor. {0} is dead....
The Sith cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but Darth Vader has no interest in following a different Sith Lord. Instead , Lord Vader force chokes {0}, leaving {0} is dead...
You tried to guard Lord Vader, but he showed you the full power of the Dark Side - throwing you against the wall and crushing your throat with the invisible power of the force. You are dead....
You bump into {0}, and turn to realize you have found none other than Darth Vader himself. You reach for your lightsaber, but you are no match for {0}. He slays you all too easily. You have died....
The cantina sees {0}'s body, lying dead in the public square with countless slashes from lightsaber wounds. {0} is dead.
The Shapeshifter 🎭 {0} has now become an Ewok, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into an Ewok. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The Shapeshifter 🎭{0} has now become a Sith cultist, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Sith cultist. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The Shapeshifter 🎭 {0} has now become a Stormtrooper, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Stormtrooper. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Darth Vader has killed everyone! He finds the stolen Death Star plans and the rebellion's hope is crushed for good. There will be no stopping him from ruling the galaxy now. Lord Vader has won!
You must find those stolen plans. Who will you kill?

With {0}'s dying breath, the chain around {1}'s throat chokes them, as they desperately try to claw their way free from the shackles that bind them. But there isn't enough time, {1} dies with their fellow prisoner. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want the prisoners to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the prisoners to be? Choose the second player
Baze Malbus 🎯
Jabba the Hutt 🏹
Darth Vader 🔪
A Shapeshifter 🎭
You have become Asajj Ventress 👶. You role model is {0}.
With all others dead, the prisoners manage to escape and have won!
In the middle of the cantina, everyone finds the body of {0}, multiple shots to the body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the heavily armed Baze Malbus! Well, {1}.
A dark figure tried to convert you to their Sith cult, but your faith in the light side of the force was too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. You will receive a galactic subspace message when the next game is starting.
A new game is starting in {0}.

Only two remain standing in the cantina. {0} turns to face {1}. Lord Vader lifts his hand and {1} feels the crushing force on his throat. Lord Vader pulls out his lightsaber and uses the force to throw the spinning blade, cleanly slicing {1} into two. The pieces that remain of the body lay on the sticky floor of the cantina.
Everyone in the cantina has died... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round...

The last two survivors in the cantina rise from their tables, {0} draws his lightsaber and {1} grabs his cannon. {0} throws the spinning lightsaber at {1}. {1} fires a barrage directly at {0}'s as {1}'s lightsaber slices him in two. Both are dead, the cantina is empty, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so the force has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
a Rebel. 👱 \nYour goal is to survive long enough to see the Empire fall.
/aboutSeer R2-D2 👳 \nAn Astromech Droid, you may access the central computer to get information about another player.

A Stormtrooper 🐺 
You are ground forces of the Empire. You may kill one player each night.
Note: If you attack the codebreaker DJ, he will join the empire.
If you attack Old Ben Kenobi, his sacrifice will buy a night for the rebels to escape your reach (This means you can't attack the following night.)

Aayla Secura 💋 \n You are Aayla Secura, a young Jedi. As you move through the cantina, you may detect the presence of the dark side (50% chance to see Sith cult). But be careful not to run into the Empire or Darth Vader, as they will kill you!

Old Ben Kenobi 🍻 \nYou are Old Ben Kenobi (Obi Wan Kenobi), a Jedi Master gifted in the ways of the Force. Should the Empire strike you down, the stormtroopers will end up checking your robes, wondering where the body went. Your sacrifice buys time for your allies to survive the empire.

DJ, a codebreaker 😾 \nYou are DJ, a shady codebreaker. You look out for yourself before anyone else. You are currently helping the Resistance, but your loyalty can easily be bought if you are caught by the Empire.

Ben Solo 🖕 \nYou are Ben Solo, son of Leia and Han. You are training in the ways of the force. However, in the absence of the Empire, You will rise with a terrifying raw power, ready to kill your former teammates!
Chewbacca 👼 \n "Gggggrrrrrr rrrraaaahhh rrrrrrggghhhhnn." You are the most loyal of allies, and your fearsome presence will scare off those who want to kill whomever you protect.

Jyn Erso 🕵 \nYou are Jyn Erso, an impetuous, defiant, and eager to bring the battle to the Empire. Used to operating alone, you finds higher purpose by taking on a desperate mission for the Rebel Alliance. You are searching for intelligence that will be key to the downfall of the Empire. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the Empire will detect you!

Han Solo 🔫 \nYou are Han Solo, scoundrel, scruffy nerfherder, and hero of the rebellion. Han shoots first.. Each day, you will have the chance to blast another player. Once you do, everyone will know who you are! Be careful though, you only have 2 shots!

Boba Fett 👺 \nYou are Boba Fett . You are the coolest character. If you are lynched, everyone else will be ashamed of themselves and are losers. Destined to die in the belly of the Sarlacc pit, maybe being lynched would be a better end for you.
R5-D4 🃏 \nR5-D4 aka Red. An Astromech Droid. Your systems are faulty, so any information you access from the central computer system is unreliable.

a Sith Cultist 👤 \nAs a Sith cultist, it is your goal to spread the power of the Dark Side and convert all other players to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins. The Empire players have no interest in joining and will kill you if you try to convert them.

Qui Gon Jinn 💂 \nYou are Qui Gon Jinn, a Jedi, and the hunter of Sith Cultists. If the Sith Cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a Sith cultist, they will die.

Assaj Ventress 👶 \nYou are Assaj Ventress. Raised by the Jedi, you turn to the Dark Side when your role model dies. At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a stormtrooper.
BB-8 🙇 You are BB-8, an Astromech droid, You will help the allies by accessing the central computer in place of R2-D2 if he becomes deactivated.
C-3PO 👁 \n You are C-3PO, a droid programmed for etiquette and protocol, and a constant companion to astromech R2-D2. You know who is the real R2-D2.
an Ewok. 👷 \nYou are an Ewok. You will be told the identity of any other Ewoks in your tribe. Otherwise, you are a simple villager.

A Changeling 🎭 \nYou are a Shapeshifter, changeling, skin-changer, amorph. You have have the ability to shift your form, to pose as another. However, you must wait until they die to assume their form, so not to cause suspicion. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role. If at the end of the game, the Changeling is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Jabba the Hutt 🏹 \n You are Jabba the Hutt. For your own amusement, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will shackled together, and will if one dies, the other is killed as well. Note: Prisoners will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the prisoners are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If at least one of the prisoners was on the winning team, they both win together.

Baze Malbus 🎯 \nYou are Baze Malbus, a former guardian of the Jedi Temple of Kyber. You carry a big gun, and if you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are blasted by the empire, you have a chance to take a Stormtrooper down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill. Note: For Empire attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one empire, the Baze has a 30% chance to kill the Empire (and survive). For each additional Empire, add 20% (2 Empire = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple Empire, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the Sith cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!
Darth Vader 🔪 \nYou are Lord Vader. The Death Star plans have been stolen and you will do anything to get them back - killing anyone in your way, even the Empire or the Sith cults.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.

You are Luke Skywalker 🎖. You will step up to lead the rebellion against the Empire. Once you have revealed yourself, your votes will count as two.
You are Princess Leia 👑, leader of the Rebellion, forced into hiding from the hands of the Empire. If you are lynched, everyone realize their error, and no one will be lynched.

You are the clumsy gungan Jar Jar Binks 🤕. You really can't get anything right, can you? Not even voting. Okay, maybe you sometimes do something ok... but purely by accident. You’re still on the rebel team, though really they would have been fine without you in Episode 1.

You are the Imperial Intelligence Agent 🔮. You seek out the droids that are secretly accessing the central computer system. If you find the droid, you will be told their identity. If you find a Stormtrooper, you will know they are on your side. Enjoy helping snuff out those miserable rebels.

You are Maz Kanata ⚒. A diminutive being with vast experience at surviving in the underworld. You have eyes open at all times, and can warn the cantina of an impending Stormtrooper attack. This preparation will delay the Stormtroopers for one night.

You are Director Krennic ⚡️; Director of Advanced Weapons Research in charge of building the Death Star. You have a 20% chance of compelling the target of your attack to join the Empire against their will.

You are Grand Moff Tarkin 🐶, commander of the Death Star and beloved by your Imperial troops. If you happen to be killed, your Stormtroopers will fly into a rage and attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

The cantina has made their accusation, and starts to remove {0}. But rather than being taken out back (and killed), everyone is stopped when {0} announces “Wait! I am Princess Leia Organa! I don't know who you are or where you came from, but from now on you'll do as I tell you, okay?" Realizing their mistake, the cantina patrons return to their tables and drinks, and the band begins to play again.
You try to look at {0}, but can't quite make out who they are. They are not a stormtrooper or droid however...
{0} steps forward and declares he is Luke Skywalker 🎖, and will lead the fight against the Empire. From now on, {0}'s votes will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as Luke Skywalker.
Step forward as Luke!
Would you like to alert the cantina, disabling the Empire tonight?

As the rest of the cantina debates over the events, {0} reveals themself as Maz Kanata, and warns everyone the Empire is preparing an attack! The cantina is on high alert, and the Stormtroopers will need more time to make a new plan for their next strike. (The Empire is disabled tonight.)

Leading the Empire attack against {0}, {1}, Director Krennic stops everyone. {1} compels {0} to join the Empire instead of dying a useless death. {0} sees no other choice to save themselves, so they reluctantly agree. They will become a Stormtrooper tomorrow night.

You were attacked by an Empire squad, lead by Director Krennic... He has taken your family, and offers you a choice - serve the Empire or be killed along with your family. You see no choice, you reluctantly agree to join. You will become a Stormtrooper tomorrow night!
Cornered by the Empire troops, you realize the pay is better working for the Empire. You bargain to join them, betraying the resistance fighters you had been helping. You are now a Stormtrooper!
Luke Skywalker 🎖 \nYou are Luke Skywalker. You may step up to lead the fight against the Empire. When you reveal, your votes will count twice.
Princess Leia 👑 \nYou are Princess Leia, leader of the Rebellion against the Empire. If the cantina votes to eliminate you, they will realize their mistake and leave you alone.

The Imperial Intelligence Agent 🔮 \nYou are the eyes of the Empire, searching for the droids detected accessing the Empire's central computer system. You will be told if a player you checked is a Stormtrooper or R2-D2. Otherwise you will not get any useful information.
Jar Jar Binks 🤕 \nYou are Jar Jar Binks. You Suck. Can you get anything right? Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

Maz Kanata ⚒ /nYou are Maz Kanata, 1000 years old, pirate, sympathetic to our heroes and savvy in survival. Sensitive to the force, you can warn the cantina of stormtrooper attack, causing the Empire to rethink their plans and plan a new strike. When you warn the cantina, the Empire will be disabled for one night.

Director Krennic ⚡️ \nYou are Director Krennic ⚡️; Director of Advanced Weapons Research in charge of building the Death Star. You have a 20% chance of compelling the target of your attack to join the Empire against their will.

Grand Moff Tarkin 🐶 \nYou are Grand Moff Tarkin, commander of the Death Star and beloved by your Imperial troops. If you happen to be killed, your Stormtroopers will fly into a rage and attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

The Sith Cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0} is blasted by the Stormtroopers. {0} is dead...

Aayla Secura tried to get close enough to {1} to check for traces of the Dark Side. Unfortunately, {0}, found the evil Lord Vader killing {1}. Aayla pulled out her lightsaber but was no match for Darth Vader. Lord Vader quickly dispatched {0}!
A high pitched "Bleeeeeeeeeppp...." trails off sadly and slowly. BB-8 has been hit by a blaster, and shuts down. {0} is dead.
After 1000 years navigating and surviving the perils of the underworld, the pirate queen Maz Kanata's luck finally gave out. {0} was overpowered by the Empire, and has died at their cruel hands.

{0} was found with a crushed windpipe, crumpled in a pile on the floor. The cruel Lord Vader will stop at nothing to retrieve the stolen Death Star plans. No one is safe, not even the Sith Cultists! The power of the Dark Side was not strong enough; {0} is dead.

The disgusting Jabba the Hutt gurgles as he is chokes. Unable to fight, all {0} can do is flap their tongue around, bulge out their eyes, and die a slow, prolonged, much-deserved asphyxiation death. We expected him to be choked by one of his prisoners, but this time it appears Darth Vader wanted {0} dead.

Lord Vader prepares to strike Obi Wan down, and instead of fighting, {0} shuts off their lightsaber, concentrates and disappears as Vader's lightsaber passes thru {0}'s empty robes. Obi Wan's robes and lightsaber lay on the floor, but the body is no where to be found.
{0} would normally have managed to scare off any attacker with a fearsome "GGGRRRWAAAAHHHGGGGHHH", but not even Chewbacca could face the fearsome Lord Vader directly and live. {0} is dead.

The smuggler Han Solo was caught off-guard! Smoke and char is all that's left of a barstool, hit by a blaster shot that missed its mark. {0} lies silently on the floor, choked to death by an unseen dark force. A blaster is no match for the evil Darth Vader. (0} has been killed.

"Noooooooooooooo!" The truth about his father was too much for Luke Skywalker to accept. Disbelieving the lies of Lord Vader, {0) must have lashed out with his lightsaber, attacking wildly and carelessly. Darth Vader quickly kills {0}, leaving the only the body behind!

Rebels frantically search the cantina, searching for signs of the leader of the rebellion, the Princess Leia. Taken prisoner by the Lord Vader, the strong willed {0} would rather die than give up the location of the secret rebel base. Lord Vader has killed {0}.

The cantina is disrupted by the high pitched squeal of a droid, followed by a long sad "blooooooooo....". Those nearby duck as sparks fly! The Droid R2-D2's memory chip has been forcefully ripped out by the evil Darth Vader, searching for information about the stolen Death Star plans. {0} was R2-D2, and has been killed.

The undercover Imperial Agent {0} was doing his job, searching for signs of the Astromech droid who was accessing the Empire's systems. {0} must have been mistaken as a rebel, as the blasters of the stormtroopers hit their target. Realizing their mistake, the stormtroopers quickly abandon the scene. The Imperial Intelligence Agent :crystal ball: {0} lies dead.
The Stormtroopers attack and kill {0}! This is a shame for the Empire; Assaj was destined to fight for the Dark Side...

The body of Qui Gon Jinn, hunter of the Sith Cultists, is found in the middle of the cantina, albeit cut precisely in two. No Sith Cultist is powerful enough have killed {0}, this must have been the work of Darth Vader. The ghost of Qui Gon Jinn will regret having checked to see if Lord Vader was a cultist...

The Stormtroopers were to mind their own business for once, staying out of trouble, but the trouble came to them. They blasted the Sith Cultist {0}. Stormtroopers have no interest in strange religions.

The Sith Cult thought they would have a new member in their ranks, but they were wrong! {0}, a Sith Cultist, is found lifeless, choked by an unseen hand. Lord Vader has shown the cult the terrifying power of the dark side.
"GWRRARRRRGGGHHHHHHHHHhhhhh" The wookie, Chewbacca howls. Normally this fearsome roar would scare off an attacker, but {0} had tried to protect none other than the evil Lord Vader.

"Where are you taking this... Thing?" the stormtroopers question. "Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaarrrgh!" Chewbacca yells. The stormtroopers realize {0} is not a prisoner, and fire their Blasters. {0} got too close to the Empire, tried to protect a stormtrooper last night and has been killed."

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} corners Han Solo, telling {0} "Freeze Scumbag! Put your hands up!" but Han always shoots first. All there is left is a body with two blasts to the torso and the last man standing: {0} is Han Solo, the hero of the Rebellion.

strings.string: Knowing only {0} was left, {1} corners Han Solo, telling {0} "Freeze Scumbag! Put your hands up!". Reaching for his blaster, Han takes a shot directly to the torso, and collapse, blaster falling from his grip. {1} will be hailed as a hero of the Empire, for their role in crushing the rebellion.

string.value: As the last two standing, {1} and {0} turn to face each other. Seeing a the red glow of {0}'s lightsaber, {1} draws their own lightsaber for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the Sith Cult. The dark side is not match for a Jedi Master.

The bounty hunter Boba Fett looks around at the carnage that has taken place in the cantina. {0} sees what an abject a failure they have been, and realized that they will not be able to complete any of their contracts. {0} leaves the cantina and is caught by the Crimson Dawn. They toss him into the Pit of Carkoon, where he is slowly digested for 1000 years. There couldn't be a more miserable end for anyone.

{0} looks around, seeing no Empire remaining, and no rebels. All this time serving to gather intelligence for the Empire, wasted. They stare at the dismal scene, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. {0} realizes this is their chance to finally escape the horrors of intergalactic war. Leaving their life as an Imperial Intelligence agent behind, {0} gets up, and packs their things, and heads off to the spaceport. Hitching a ride of the first freighter leaving this system, {0} starts a new life, on a new planet, perhaps as a farmer. Later, the First Order destroys {0}'s new home when testing Starkiller Base.

You are Rey 🌀. The force is strong with you, but you don't yet understand the balance between light and dark. You have strong visions, and you don't quite understand them, but you are wise not to fully trust them. Each night use the force to look at someone, but you will only be able to see what they are NOT. You will be given a role of someone else in the game that is still alive, so pay attention to what role is said, that means one is still alive :)
Rey 🌀
